title: Drawing, "Leigh B. Block Apartment: Terrace Game Room", 1934–35
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower left: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with instructions and dimensions
description: Plan and layout for terrace game room. Double-door entrance at center of north wall. Chair  to left of entrance; curved corner in upper left with flower planters along curve of wall. West wall of glass bricks with shelves lining wall. Bar against west wall; five circular bar stools facing bar. Glass brick wall on south wall; large window at center of south wall. Card table and chairs near lower left of room. Flower planters on south wall at far right; two chairs and circular end table in lower right corner. Three-seat sofa on upper wall at right with small end table at left. Small flower planter to right of sofa.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Leigh B. Block Apartment: Terrace Game Room", 1934–35.
1934–35. Graphite on tracing paper. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-557.
